title: Frontend Engineer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality, reusable UI components using React and TypeScript. Collaborate closely with UX designers and backend engineers to deliver seamless user experiences. Ideal candidates have a strong understanding of responsive design, performance optimization, and modern frontend tooling.
about: TechNova is a fast-growing technology company focused on delivering innovative solutions to clients worldwide.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain reusable UI components.
Collaborate with UX and backend teams.
Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Write clean, maintainable code with proper documentation.
requirements: Strong knowledge of React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Experience with REST APIs and Git.
Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: DesignCo is seeking a creative UI/UX Designer to craft intuitive and accessible user interfaces. You'll work closely with product managers and engineers to transform concepts into pixel-perfect designs, conduct user research, and ensure compliance with accessibility standards.
about: DesignCo is a leading design agency committed to creating impactful user experiences.
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs.
Collaborate with engineering and product teams.
Conduct user research and usability testing.
Ensure accessibility and responsive design compliance.
requirements: Strong portfolio demonstrating UI/UX design skills.
Proficiency with Figma and Adobe XD.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Support senior developers in building responsive web apps. Learn best practices and contribute to frontend and backend tasks in an agile environment.
about: DevStart is a startup providing custom software solutions for local businesses.
responsibilities: Assist in coding and testing web applications.
Fix bugs and improve application performance.
Work under guidance of senior developers.
Participate in code reviews.
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Eagerness to learn and grow as a developer.
Ability to work in a team.

title: React Native Developer
description: Build and maintain cross-platform mobile apps with React Native. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality mobile experiences.
about: MobileGenius specializes in innovative mobile solutions for clients worldwide.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain React Native applications.
Write clean and efficient code.
Collaborate on app design and user experience.
Fix bugs and optimize performance.
requirements: Familiarity with Expo and mobile build processes.

title: Accessibility Engineer
description: Ensure web experiences are accessible to all users by implementing and testing WCAG and ARIA standards across all products.
about: InclusiveTech is dedicated to making technology accessible for everyone.
responsibilities: Audit web applications for accessibility issues.
Implement ARIA roles and best practices.
Work with teams to fix accessibility bugs.
Stay updated on accessibility guidelines.
requirements: Proficiency in JavaScript and frontend testing.
Familiarity with screen readers and assistive tech.

title: Frontend Tech Lead
description: Lead a team of frontend developers to ship high-quality features, establish best practices, and maintain a scalable codebase.
about: VisionaryApps builds cutting-edge software solutions for enterprise clients.
responsibilities: Mentor and guide frontend engineers.
Define architecture and coding standards.
Review code and manage releases.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams.

title: Email Developer
description: Build responsive and branded HTML emails that render correctly across all major email clients.
about: MarketingNinja specializes in data-driven email campaigns.
responsibilities: Develop and test HTML emails.
Ensure cross-client compatibility.
Work with marketing team on designs.
Optimize emails for deliverability.

title: Design Systems Engineer
description: Build and document reusable UI components across products, maintaining design consistency and developer productivity.
about: ComponentHub is a remote-first company focusing on scalable design systems.
responsibilities: Create reusable UI components in React and TypeScript.
Document components in Storybook.
Collaborate with designers and developers.
Maintain design consistency across apps.
